item.title: Fleeting moments
item.description: It’s kind of weird to feel I’m in the eye of the storm. She sleeps peacefully with our cat on her side and I feel free and content just for a brief period of time, feeling that all our problems, fights, disagreements, tears, sadness and crazy feelings just don’t exist. It’s like observing them from a far distance, watching them in a blurry fashion. Perhaps life is about these moments and nothing else.
